name: using-drupal
description: The Drupal 8.7 installation that works with Gatsby's using-drupal example.

scripts.backup: rm -rf backup; mkdir backup; cd web; drush cr; drush -y wd-del all; cd ..; cp -pr web/sites/default/files backup/; cp -pr config backup/

author: John Albin Wilkins <john.albin@amazee.com> (https://www.amazee.io/)
